SEARCH
Package battleship.view

Klasse View

java.lang.Object
processing.core.PApplet
battleship.view.View
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
IView, processing.core.PConstants
public class View extends processing.core.PApplet implements IView
The View represents the graphical user interface for the Battleship game. It extends the PApplet class from the Processing library. This class is responsible for rendering the game screens, including the start screen, game over screens, and the main play screen with player and computer grids.

    • drawGuideBuild

      private void drawGuideBuild()

    • drawPlayScreen

      public void drawPlayScreen(Grid p, Grid c, Grid invC, int[] shipL)
      Draws the main play screen with player and computer grids. There are a legend to describe the different field colours of the grids, a guide with informations and an information about all possible ship lengths. Also there is a little GIF.
      Angegeben von:
      drawPlayScreen in Schnittstelle IView
      Parameter:
      p - The player grid with the computer ships (player has to shoot at this).
      c - The computer grid with the player ships (computer has to shoot at this).
      invC - The invisible computer grid with the computer ships (player cant see computer ships).
      shipL - All available ship lengths.
